examples.example: 我的财务状况通过合理规划变得越来越好。

translate.english: My financial situation has become better and better through reasonable planning.

examples.example: 通过不断学习财务知识，他成功地打理好了自己的个人财务。

translate.english: By continuously learning financial knowledge, he successfully managed his personal finances well.

examples.example: 他在财务方面有着出色的天赋，将自己的资产打理得井井有条。

translate.english: He has excellent talent in the financial aspect and manages his assets in an orderly manner.
